DOC.detailed_description: Method A consecutive cohort 249 infertile woman attend In vitro fertilization ( IVF ) Intra-cytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) treatment Fertility Clinic , Arhus University Hospital requite February 2011 May 2013 . During period , couple undergo IVF/ICSI treatment offer blastocyst culture day 6 time-lapse imaging ( TLI ) part study evaluate parameter embryo selection ( Kirkegaard et al . 2013 ) . Women age < 38 year without endometriosis > 8 oocyte retrieve eligible . Patients categorize two group . Women regular menstrual cycle clinical sign PCOS ( non-PCOS ) woman fulfil Rotterdam diagnostic criterion PCOS detect presence anovulation polycystic ovary PCO , diagnose luteal-phase progesterone test trans-vaginal ultrasound , respectively . Biochemical parameter androgen excess include diagnosis available , , whereas subjective symptom androgen excess ( acne , hirsutism , alopecia ) include . Ethical approval Written inform consent obtain patient inclusion . The Central Denmark Region Committees Biomedical Research Ethics Danish Data Protection Agency approve study . Ovarian stimulation : Patients treat individual dos gonadotropin , base serum AMH and/or antral follicle count . Patients stimulate either GnRH agonist- antagonist protocol use rec-FSH HMG stimulation accord clinical guideline . A dose 10,000 IU hCG administer least 3 follicle measure ≥ 17 mm , UL guide oocyte retrieval conduct 36 h later . Oocyte retrieval ICSI/IVF Ovarian stimulation oocyte retrieval perform accord standard procedure . After fertilization , ICSI embryos immediately place time-lapse incubator ( EmbryoScope™ ) . IVF embryo culture approximately 18 h conventional incubator . Before IVF embryo transfer EmbryoScope , adhere cumulus cell remove ensure optimal image acquisition . In EmbryoScope , embryos culture arrest removal day 6 . Embryo assessment . All embryos 2 pronucleus complete first cleavage annotate manually.The follow parameter annotate time-points : appearance disappearance 1st nucleus 2nd nucleus 1st division , 1st - 7th division , final division , compaction , morula , early full expand blastocyst , start hatch fully hatch blastocyst . All time-points normalize first cleavage treat duration analysis order overcome limitation inexact start point , facilitate comparison IVF ICSI population . For reason , parameter first cleavage investigate . Durations cell cycle cell stage subsequently calculate interval two time-points . Two parameter ( multi-nucleation direct cleavage 3-cell stage ) assess binary value yes . Embryos select transfer accord conventional measure morphological quality day 6 accord Gardner criterion ( Gardner et al . 2004 ) . No time-lapse parameter use selection process . The observer blind patient 's treatment data medical history . Statistics The influence PCOS embryo development test regression model cluster data . A covariance regression model use account potential confounding variable : female age , BMI fertility treatment . In total , 313 embryo 43 PCOS woman , 1080 embryo 175 non-PCOS woman analyze .
